messages.message: We may (?) need to do this in shared-utils as well, though maybe since the Go code is copied in from shared-utils, it will still catch things in shared-utils?

Hey there, apologies for the delay -- I have put up https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/69469 for integrating staticcheck analyzers. I had to disable a bunch of them (as expected), and I'm not sure which ones we want to keep vs exclude indefinitely (e.g. I found source from far before we ever onboarded to bazel which violates ST1003 (https://staticcheck.dev/docs/checks#ST1003), so I'm guessing we never had those checks enabled in the first place?)
OK, let's merge it, and then work through & remove the linter exceptions one-by-one. Ideally, there are none. cc @Heymian
